Question: The Peninsular War and 1812 French invasion of Russia marked turning points in this person's fortunes.
Hints: This person once told his brother Lucien in April 1801, "Skillful conquerors have not got entangled with priests.
Unlike many generals this person did not turn to history to ask what Hannibal or Alexander or whoever did in a similar situation.
As **** I, he was Emperor of the French from 1804 to 1815.
